title: ECharts tooltip component
description: tooltip component config. Use as top-level key in ECharts option.

axisPointer.description: Props: mainType, type, link, id, name, z, zlevel, show, animation, animationDurationUpdate, animationEasingUpdate, value, triggerOn, snap, triggerTooltip, triggerEmphasis, status, label, lineStyle, shadowStyle, handle, seriesDataIndices, axis, crossStyle

trigger.description: Trigger only works on coordinate system.

renderMode.description:
'auto': use html by default, and use non-html if `document` is not defined
'html': use html for tooltip
'richText': use canvas, svg, and etc. for tooltip

appendTo.description:
If append the tooltip element to another DOM element.
Only available when renderMode is html

className.description:
Specify the class name of tooltip element
Only available when renderMode is html

alwaysShowContent.description: Whether to not hide popup content automatically

valueFormatter.description:
Formatter of value.

Will be ignored if tooltip.formatter is specified.

position.description:
Absolution pixel [x, y] array. Or relative percent string [x, y] array.
If trigger is 'item'. position can be set to 'inside' / 'top' / 'left' / 'right' / 'bottom',
which is relative to the hovered element.

Support to be a callback

align.description: Consider triggered from axisPointer handle, verticalAlign should be 'middle'

enterable.description:
Whether mouse is allowed to enter the floating layer of tooltip
If you need to interact in the tooltip like with links or buttons, it can be set as true.

padding.description: Padding between tooltip content and tooltip border.

textStyle.description: Props: align, width, height, fontSize, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, lineHeight, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, decoration
